dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Thought Process
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze information methodically and arrive at well-reasoned conclusions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and experience to navigate complex situations.

dimensions.label: Decision Making
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on facts and data to inform their choices, weighing the evidence carefully.
Your FarTwin will consider personal values and ethics when making decisions, prioritizing principles over pragmatic considerations.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with groups?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take charge and speak up in group settings, contributing their ideas and opinions.
Your FarTwin will listen actively and work collaboratively with others to achieve common goals.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will create schedules and to-do lists, carefully planning out their day.
Your FarTwin will go with the flow, adapting to changing circumstances and seizing opportunities as they arise.

dimensions.label: Creativity
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down creative problems into manageable parts, analyzing each step to arrive at a solution.
Your FarTwin will rely on their instincts and imagination to generate innovative ideas and solutions.

dimensions.label: Attitude Towards Failure
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle setbacks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will bounce back from failure, using it as an opportunity to learn and grow.
Your FarTwin will feel discouraged by failure, struggling to regain momentum and confidence.

dimensions.label: Confidentiality
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle sensitive information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take extra precautions to safeguard confidential data, ensuring its security and integrity.
Your FarTwin will share sensitive information freely, trusting that those around them can be trusted to handle it responsibly.
